Uplift Mighty 23-24 Science Fair

Welcome to the 2023 Elementary Science Fair! This exciting event is a chance for students in 3rd to 5th grade to showcase their scientific curiosity and creativity. Whether you're a seasoned science fair veteran or a first-time participant, we're here to help you make the most of this experience.

EXPLORE

To help you get started, we've compiled a wealth of resources on this website, including helpful tips for choosing a project, conducting research, and presenting your findings. We've also included a list of project ideas to spark your inspiration.

FOR PARENTS

We know that parent and family involvement is crucial to a successful science fair experience. That's why we've created a section specifically for parents and guardians, with information on how you can support your child's project from start to finish. So what are you waiting for? Start exploring and let your curiosity guide you! We can't wait to see what amazing discoveries you'll make at this year's Elementary Science Fair.

Brought to you by Mr. Barcenas
